name: DiscoOps
short: Operational features for Discord server management
description: DiscoOps provides tools to manage Discord servers more efficiently, including tracking new members, analyzing roles, and managing event attendees with Discord's built-in scheduled events.
author: YourName
install_msg:
Thank you for installing DiscoOps! Use `[p]help DiscoOps` or `[p]do help` to get started.

**Key Features:**
• Track recently joined members
• Analyze role membership
• Manage Discord scheduled events
• Create and sync event roles

**Required Permissions:**
The bot needs 'Manage Roles' permission to create/manage event roles.

**Quick Start:**
`[p]do members new 7 days` - See new members
`[p]do events list` - List all events
`[p]do help` - Full command list
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord event role mappings per guild. It does not store any personal user data. To delete the data, unload the cog and reset the config.
